title: James Gray on ‘Armageddon Time,’ Antisemitism and Racism in 1980s Queens
description: Fred and Maryanne Trump are characters in the drama, reflecting the director James Gray’s real experiences growing up at a cultural inflection point.
dc:creator: Ben Kenigsberg
media:credit: Mark Sommerfeld for The New York Times
media:description: After a difficult experience on his previous film, “Ad Astra,” James Gray said, “I wanted to rediscover what it is I loved about movies. And that’s not an easy thing when you’re 53.”
